alert.note: Alert for Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fall River County through 245 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Provo, or 19 miles southwest of Edgemont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Fall River County, southwest of Provo and Rumford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
